description:
Located in Liberty, Missouri, Michael S. Shipley, LLC, is committed to protecting the rights of people who are facing criminal charges. With nearly three decades of experience representing clients in both criminal and civil litigation and outstanding academic credentials, we provide premium legal services, with the personalized and focused attention of a small-firm, to residents of the Kansas City metropolitan area and throughout Northwest Missouri, including Caldwell, Clay, Clinton, Daviess, DeKalb, Harrision, Platte and Ray counties.

At our law office, we handle cases ranging from minor traffic violations to misdemeanors and serious felonies. We have successfully defended hundreds of cases including speeding tickets, DUI, drug crimes, sexual offenses, white collar crimes and assault. By taking the time to answer any questions and providing an honest and thorough assessment of the law and facts applicable to each case, we put the needs of our clients first. Our team explores every option and possible outcome, so those facing allegations have as much information as possible to assist them in making decisions, and know what to expect as their case progresses.

Michael S. Shipley, LLC, also handles a variety of civil litigation matters, including police brutality and civil rights, serious personal injury, wrongful death and commercial disputes. We are committed to assisting people in reaching their goals. We make every effort to resolve cases as promptly and efficiently as possible, whether through plea, settlement or mediation, but are always prepared to take any case to trial should the need arise.
